sent.orig: Buy alldates you need from one source and save shipping costs.
sent.trans: Buy您从一个源需要出售的具体年，节省运输成本。

sent.orig: He's going to buy Mary a dictionary. He's going to buy a dictionary for Mary.
If I had to buy a house, buy now, or another and so on?
sent.trans: 如果我要买房，是现在买，还是再等等？

sent.orig: The next time I buy a TV set, I'm going to buy a portable model.
sent.trans: 下一次我买电视机时，我打算买一部手提式的。

sent.orig: Rural residents have been encouraged to buy cars and urban residents to buy homes.
sent.trans: 乡村居民被鼓励购买汽车，城市居民则在购置房屋。
